DOC.brief_summary: In cooperation Merck & Co , Inc. identify form database 35 patient developed osteochemonecrosis jaw related oral bisphosphonate use . We study trigger , associate medical condition medication , location lesion ( ) , patient outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Proposal For The Development Of A Well Defined Database For Patients With Oral Bisphosphonate-Related Osteonecrosis
DOC.detailed_description: This study observational study , comparative trial . The major outcome represent fraction subject long term heal lesion .
DOC.criteria: Exposed bone oral cavity great 68 week duration unresponsive therapy Pregnant patient Patients less 30 yr age great 90 yrs age Mentally incompetent individual
